casebody.data:
In the Matter of N.T. No. 119PA15. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 20, 2015. W. Michael Spivey, Attorney at Law, Rocky Mount, For Townsend, James. Roger A. Askew, Attorney at Law, For Wake County Human Services. Shannon Hoff, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, For GAL. Claire A. Hunter, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, For Wake County Human Services.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 31st of March 2015 for Writ of Supersedeas of the judgment of the Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 20th of April 2015 by Petitioner in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of August 2015."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
